CustomField.description: Concatenation of email addresses to pass to the CC address when the Send and Email button is used.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(HR_Specialist__r.Email), '', HR_Specialist__r.Email & '; ') & IF( ISBLANK(Sales_Rep__r.Email), '', Sales_Rep__r.Email & '; ') & IF( ISBLANK(National_Sales_Rep__r.Email ), '', National_Sales_Rep__r.Email & '; ') & IF( ISBLANK(PEO_Sales_Analyst__r.Email ), '', PEO_Sales_Analyst__r.Email & '; ') & IF( ISBLANK(FSS__r.Email), '', FSS__r.Email & '; ') & IF( ISBLANK(Implementation_Project_Manager__r.Email), '', Implementation_Project_Manager__r.Email& '; ')& IF( ISBLANK(NCS_Payroll_Specialist__r.Email ), '', NCS_Payroll_Specialist__r.Email& '; ')& IF( ISBLANK(Onboarding_HRG__r.Email ), '', Onboarding_HRG__r.Email& '; ')& IF( ISBLANK(Responsible_HRG__r.Email ), '', Responsible_HRG__r.Email& '; ')& IF( ISBLANK(NCS_Benefits_Specialist__r.Email ), '', NCS_Benefits_Specialist__r.Email)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Concatenation of email addresses to pass to the CC address when the Send and Email button is used.
CustomField.label: CC Addresses
